title: Create standalone HTML demo page for Neroxa AI

requirements.summary: Generate a standalone HTML file with all inline CSS and JavaScript for full self-containment
acceptanceCriteria: HTML file contains inline <style> tags with all necessary CSS
HTML file contains inline <script> tags with all necessary JavaScript
File can be opened directly in a browser without a build process
All functionality works without external file dependencies

file_operations.description: Create a standalone HTML file with inline CSS (incorporating Tailwind-inspired styles from frontend/src/index.css and the dark theme aesthetic) and inline JavaScript for interactive functionality. Include all necessary styles within <style> tags and all scripts within <script> tags to ensure zero external dependencies. The file must be fully functional when opened directly in a browser.

requirements.summary: Include proper HTML5 structure with DOCTYPE, meta tags, and semantic elements
acceptanceCriteria: Meta viewport tag configured for responsive design

file_operations.description: Ensure the HTML file includes: HTML5 DOCTYPE declaration, <head> section with UTF-8 charset meta tag, viewport meta tag for responsive design (width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0), appropriate title tag, and semantic HTML5 elements throughout the body (header, nav, main, section, footer as applicable).

requirements.summary: Create a functional demo showcasing Neroxa AI's core features in an interactive format
acceptanceCriteria: Page displays navigation or tabs for different features
Each feature section is visually distinct and labeled
Page maintains visual consistency across sections

file_operations.description: Implement interactive demo sections for all core features: chat interface, math solver with expression evaluation, media generation showcase, language translator with dropdown selectors, music generator interface, art/drawing canvas, code generation scripter, and games showcase. Include tab navigation or accordion-style sections to switch between features. Add working interactive elements (input fields, buttons, demo outputs) with inline JavaScript event handlers. Maintain visual consistency using the dark theme color scheme (teal primary, coral accents) throughout all sections. Each feature section should have clear labels and demonstrate mock functionality without backend integration.
